channel.title: Other on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site
channel.description: Recent content in Other on Atsuya Watanabe's Personal Web-site

item.title: Seminar held
item.description: I attented “初めてのCAD、初めての3Dプリンター講習会” (Lecture for using CAD and 3D-printer for the first time) as an instructor. Lecture for using CAD and 3D-printer for the first time (Basic practice for prototyping) Center for Advanced Education in Entrepreneurship and Innovation at Osaka Metropolitan University, Sakai, from 2022-11 to 2022-12.

Web seminar held I attented “LaTeXを使った卒論・レポート作成講座” (Writing seminar for reports and thesis using LaTeX) as an instructor. Writing seminar for reports and thesis using LaTeX Acaric Co., Ltd. Cloud LaTeX Team. Zoom, 2022-12-23.
SiMS QE I passed the Qualification Examination for Graduate Course for System-Inspired Leaders in Multidisciplinary Science (SiMS) at Osaka Metropolitan University.

item.title: Introduction movie for our laboratory on YouTube
item.description: A laboratory I am belonging has been introduced on a YouTube channel of Osaka Metropolitan University. (in Japanese only…)
